officialNotes.nose: Rich vanilla, honey, and a hint of citrus.
officialNotes.palate: Smooth with dried fruit, spice, and caramel.
officialNotes.finish: Long-lasting with subtle oak and sweetness.

userNotes.nose: Sweet and fruity with hints of apple.
userNotes.palate: Creamy with toffee and a touch of pepper.

history.label: Production
history.title: Distilled
history.description: The whiskey was distilled in the Highland region.

history.label: Maturation
history.title: Cask Aging
history.description: Aged in sherry oak casks for 12 years.

history.label: Bottling
history.title: Bottled
history.description: The whiskey was bottled and prepared for distribution.
